message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our unique product to you. This item holds significant value to us, but we're confident it will be an excellent investment for you as well. We're offering it to you for $1150000. We believe this price reflects the product's true worth and provides a fair opportunity for both parties. Let us know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and interests.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1000000. I believe this price would be more in line with my budget and would allow me to make a more comfortable investment.

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In light of that, we're willing to reconsider our initial offer. We propose to sell the product to you for $1050000. This price still reflects the product's value while allowing for a more manageable investment for you. We hope this proposal better aligns with your expectations.

I appreciate your willingness to reconsider, but I'm still a bit above $1050000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'd like to offer $1025000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I'm hoping we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement.
